meanings.definition: Not forming or based on opinions or evaluations.
meanings.sent1: She appreciated her friend's nonjudgemental attitude towards her decisions.
meanings.sent2: It is important to be nonjudgemental when listening to others.
meanings.sent3: The nonjudgemental cat observed the chaos in the room with calm indifference.
meanings.sent4: The clear sky served as a nonjudgemental backdrop to the colorful fireworks display.
meanings.sent5: The nonjudgemental nature of the mirror reflected everything without bias.

meanings.definition: Not tending to judge, criticize, or condemn.
meanings.sent1: The nonjudgemental teacher always encouraged her students to express themselves freely.
meanings.sent2: A nonjudgemental approach can foster open communication in relationships.
meanings.sent3: The nonjudgemental squirrel watched the acrobatic antics of the other animals with amusement.
meanings.sent4: The nonjudgemental river flowed peacefully, accepting all debris that came its way.
meanings.sent5: The nonjudgemental garden welcomed all kinds of plants to grow harmoniously together.
